subject: Communication
title: The Conflict Escalation Ladder
description: Learn The Conflict Escalation Ladder in one minute.

hook.text: A small misunderstanding between neighbors escalated into a decade-long legal battle costing both families everything.

buildup.text: Friedrich Glasl mapped nine stages of conflict escalation â€” from discussion to mutual destruction.

discovery.text: Stage 1-3: win-win is still possible. Stage 4-6: win-lose dynamics take over. Stage 7-9: both sides seek to destroy.

twist.text: Most conflicts become unsolvable not because the issue is complex, but because emotions escalated past the point of.

climax.text: Recognizing which stage a conflict is at determines whether dialogue, mediation, or intervention is needed.

punchline.text: Every war started as a conversation. Escalation is the real enemy.
